channel.title: Problem with making npc dialogue
channel.description:
Hey moparscapers, I have a problem with making npc dialogue. Every time I try to make npc dialogue, it won't let me.. For every single punctuation mark I insert I get an error in my compile "not a statement" everywhere. Please help ASAP.
Thanks in advance.
~ Macoronizer
